awd_titl_txt: Support of Workshop:  NATO Advanced Research on Nitrate Con-tamination:  Exposure, Consequences and Control, September  10-14, 1990
awd_abstract_narration: This is an award to provide support for a workshop on                           nitrate contamination of groundwater, exposure,                                 consequences and control.  The workshop will be held at                         the University of Nebraska, Lincoln from September 10-14,                       1990 and is being principally supported by the NATO                             Scientific Affairs Division.  This award from NSF will                          permit extending support for participation in this                              conference by Dr. Jaroslav Vrba, Chairman of the                                Commission for Groundwater Protections of the                                   International Association of Hydrogeologists                                    (Czechoslovakia) who will speak on Hydrogeological System                       Nitrate Contamination - Origin and Control in Eastern                           European Countries, or by an alternative person on a                            similar topic.                                                                                                                                                  Results of this workshop are expected to provide guidance                       to the program in its support of research on groundwater                        pollution from substances that contribute nitrogenous                           substances to groundwater aquifers.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: BOARD OF REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA
